oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Walter Winchell's Jergens Journal - 1943-09-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC Blue Network program Walter Winchell's Jergens Journal, with announcer Ben Grauer and host Walter Winchell. Originally broadcast 1943-09-05, sponsored by Jergens Lotion.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Ben Grauer) -- Jergens Lotion commercial (Ben Grauer) -- Ben Grauer introduces Walter Winchell -- News report (Walter Winchell) -- Jergens Lotion commercial (Ben Grauer, [unidentified female]) -- News report (Walter Winchell) -- Closing statement (Walter Winchell) -- Jergens Face Cream commercial (Ben Grauer) -- Closing statement (Ben Grauer)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blue Network Company; Winchell, Walter, 1897-1972; Grauer, Ben
